installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Pufferfish Installation Script - Fixed by Borno Inc

cd /mnt/server

if [ -n "${DL_PATH}" ]; then
    echo -e "Using supplied download url: ${DL_PATH}"
    DOWNLOAD_URL=`eval echo $(echo ${DL_PATH} | sed -e 's/{{/${/g' -e 's/}}/}/g')`
else
    MC_VER="${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
    if [ "${MC_VER}" == "latest" ] || [ -z "${MC_VER}" ]; then
        MC_VER="1.21"
        echo -e "Latest version selected. Fetching Pufferfish ${MC_VER} build..."
    else
        echo -e "Fetching Pufferfish for version: ${MC_VER}"
    fi

    JOB_NAME="Pufferfish-${MC_VER}"
    API_URL="https://ci.pufferfish.host/job/${JOB_NAME}/lastSuccessfulBuild/api/json"
    
    # Get Jenkins JSON data
    API_RESPONSE=$(curl -sSL "${API_URL}")
    
    if echo "$API_RESPONSE" | grep -q "Not Found" || [ -z "$API_RESPONSE" ]; then
        echo -e "Specific job not found, trying fallback 'Pufferfish' job..."
        JOB_NAME="Pufferfish"
        API_URL="https://ci.pufferfish.host/job/${JOB_NAME}/lastSuccessfulBuild/api/json"
        API_RESPONSE=$(curl -sSL "${API_URL}")
    fi

    # Extract exact artifact path dynamically
    ARTIFACT_PATH=$(echo "$API_RESPONSE" | sed -n 's/.*"relativePath":"\([^"]*\)".*/\1/p' | head -n 1)

    if [ -n "$ARTIFACT_PATH" ]; then
        DOWNLOAD_URL="https://ci.pufferfish.host/job/${JOB_NAME}/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/${ARTIFACT_PATH}"
    else
        echo -e "Jenkins API failed. Trying official Pufferfish download portal fallback..."
        DOWNLOAD_URL="https://pufferfish.host/download/${MC_VER}/latest"
    fi
fi

echo -e "Downloading from: ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"

if [ -f ${SERVER_JARFILE} ]; then
    mv ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${SERVER_JARFILE}.old
fi

if ! curl -fsSL -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} "${DOWNLOAD_URL}"; then
    echo -e "Download failed on primary link."
fi

if [ ! -s ${SERVER_JARFILE} ] || [ $(stat -c%s "${SERVER_JARFILE}") -lt 1000000 ]; then
    echo -e "-------------------------------------------------------"
    echo -e "ERROR: Download failed! The JAR is missing or too small."
    echo -e "Make sure Pufferfish supports version: ${MC_VER}"
    echo -e "-------------------------------------------------------"
    exit 1
fi

echo -e "Download complete!"

if [ ! -f server.properties ]; then
    curl -sSL -o server.properties https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/minecraft/java/server.properties
fi
